name: Maulie Tankard

skills.name: Roast
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases by 50% if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Damage Multiplier: 3.3 DEF

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Bar Brawl (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Places a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on the target for 2 turns instead. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Level 2: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Cheers! (Cooldown: 6 turns)
skills.description:
Revives an ally with 50% HP and fills their Turn Meter by 50%. Places a [Block Damage] buff on that ally for 1 turn.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Rowdy Crowd (Passive, Cooldown: 2 turns)
skills.description:
Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% when this Champion is hit. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 25% when this Champion is hit by a Boss.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
